items.videoDescription: Phil Miller continues to live in Tucson. THE LAST MAN ON EARTH airs Sundays on FOX.
items.name: The Last Man on Earth

items.videoDescription: The family struggles to adapt to life after Bruce and Kris's divorce.  Kim wants to give North a sibling as soon as possible and she'll stop at nothing to get pregnant.
items.name: Keeping up with the Kardashians

items.videoDescription: Don tries to track down a friend. Joan struggles to solve a problem with an account. Peggy is set up by an unlikely person.
items.name: Mad Men

items.videoDescription: Hook leverages his complicated history with Ursula to find out what she knows about Gold's endgame. Gold and the Queens of Darkness torture August for information about the Author as Emma, Mary Margaret and David race to find them. Regina grows concerned for Robin Hood's safety while she struggles to maintain her cover with the villains.
items.name: Once Upon a Time

items.videoDescription: The vigilante stalking Ben ups the ante and begins a dangerous game of cat and mouse. Desperate about his family's safety, Ben begrudgingly accepts Detective Cornell's offer of protection for Christy and his daughters, while refusing any police surveillance for himself. Having temporarily moved in with his friend and confidante Dave, Ben thinks he has managed to escape Cornell's laser-like focus for a while, only to find that he is forced to re-live his past mistakes while fighting for his life.
items.name: Secrets and Lies

items.videoDescription: Ends 05/29/15. 'Optimal Tip-to-Tip Efficiency.' Season One Finale. Poised to compete at TechCrunch Disrupt,the guys of Pied Piper become worried after an impressive presentation by Gavin Belson. As Jared tries to pivot the company,Richard is inspired to make big changes at the last minute.
items.name: Silicon Valley

items.videoDescription: In the series premiere, Sgt. Odelle Ballard unwittingly stumbles upon an explosive secret that places her at the center of an international cover-up.
items.name: American Odyssey

items.videoDescription: Ends 12/31/15. 'New Hampshire.' Season Three Finale. Selina and staff juggle her schedule in the days leading up to the New Hampshire primary.
items.name: Veep

items.videoDescription: Dr. C and the Women: Meg gets a new job at the airport, where she’s instantly popular for being the hottest employee there. FAMILY GUY airs Sundays on FOX.
items.name: Family Guy

items.videoDescription: As Emily fights to clear Jack's name in and out of court, newlyweds Nolan and Louise receive a visit from Officer Ben Hunter.
items.name: Revenge

items.videoName: The Musk Who Fell To Earth
items.episodeName: The Musk Who Fell to Earth
items.videoDescription: S26Ep12, The Musk Who Fell To Earth: When inventor Elon Musk lands in Springfield, he and Homer become fast friends and revolutionize the town’s nuclear plant. THE SIMPSONS airs Sundays on FOX.
items.name: The Simpsons

items.videoDescription: S2Ep10, The Pontiac Bandit Returns: “The Pontiac Bandit,” aka Doug Judy (guest star Craig Robinson), is back in custody. BROOKLYN NINE-NINE airs Sundays on FOX.
items.name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine

items.videoDescription: Mary Sibley faces both foreign and domestic challenges. HD
items.name: Salem

items.videoName: A Dose of Dumb, The Feline File, and Bowling
items.videoDescription: This week's highlights include a young girl telling her mother she's finished all of her dinner and then running away when her mom says she's going to check the trashcan, a little boy terribly embarrassed by his dad who is wearing an ugly sweater and pleads with him to change, a package of funny cat clips including a feline pulling down a fireplace grate while trying to get at a Christmas stocking, a little girl opening a box with a puppy inside and mistaking it for a large hamster, and Tom playing "Pick the Real Video."
items.name: America's Funniest Home Videos

items.videoDescription: Following an intense season one reunion, the group of feisty up-and-comers are back in action in the city that never sleeps.
items.name: Blood Sweat and Heels

items.videoDescription: Alton reveals the sabotages for omelets and cream puffs.
items.name: Cutthroat Kitchen

items.videoDescription: S5Ep12, The Millie-churian Candidate: Tina and Louise volunteer to run Jimmy Junior’s class president campaign in order to keep Millie (guest voice Molly Shannon) from winning. BOB’S BURGERS airs Sundays on FOX.
items.name: Bob's Burgers

items.videoDescription: Tim Allen, who stars as Mike Baxter on the hit series "Last Man Standing," guest stars in a crossover: Mike seeks legal help when he wants to expand his Outdoor Man Store’s gun range in Dallas. But Trent already greased every palm in town to build the original, so Cristela is tasked with gaining the favor of the zoning commissioner. This puts her in an awkward position since she isn't fond of guns.
items.name: Cristela

items.videoDescription: At the grand opening of The Outdoor Man Grill, things get tense when restaurant manager Kristin feels like co-owner Ed is undermining her ability to run the place. Meanwhile, Eve distances herself from a childhood girlfriend who seems to have a crush on her.
items.name: Last Man Standing

items.videoDescription: Barbara Corcoran and Kevin O'Leary renew their vows of "Shark Love" when two men from Las Vegas, NV pitch an innovative way to tie the knot with their mobile wedding service. Two young women from Palo Alto hope to empower the next generation of female engineers. A family man believes that an investment by the Sharks in his porcelain coffee mug will mean a better future for his family. Two men pitch their design of a more precise golf putter.
items.name: Shark Tank

items.videoDescription: The island becomes the target of a chemical attack as Julia and Sarah prepare Sister Amy for her bizarre surgery.
items.name: Helix

items.videoDescription: The girls go out for another wild night but things take a turn when Kristiana gets into an altercation with a guy. Later, Lolly and Kristiana get into a fight and security is called.
items.videoName: Hell Hath No Fury Like a Preachers' Daughter
items.episodeName: Hell Hath No Fury Like a Preachers' Daughter
items.name: Preachers Daughters

items.videoDescription: After a well-liked young man is found murdered and dumped in a Hialeah alleyway, Kelly and Yolanda must piece together an intricate puzzle, to find out who is guilty of this savage killing.
items.name: Cold Justice

items.videoDescription: Pastor Bullock hopes to use Bishop Vaughn’s town hall meeting to spur his political aspirations, but he finds they have different agendas. The Shelby's help a homeless mother. Evangelist Dorinda is forced to confront demons of her past. Episode 107
items.name: Preachers of Detroit

items.videoDescription: Ends 07/11/15. Ben Anderson follows the cocaine highway from the streets of Venezuela, to drug smuggling boats in the Caribbean, to the ports of West Africa, and finally to desert territories controlled by Islamic extremists. VICE looks at the boom in one of the world's newest billion-dollar industries: gestational surrogacy.
items.episodeName: Lines in the Sand and Outsourcing Embryos
items.name: Vice

items.videoDescription: When O'Neal's brand new, souped up Jeep fails to impress his mother-in-law, O'Neal tries to score points by hosting his first Shabbat Dinner.
items.name: Kosher Soul
